main event: A yellow balloon was observed ascending in Duluth, Minnesota on April 27, 1960.
interesting points: The object was reported to have a round shape and was pea-shaped in appearance., The balloon emitted a round dim yellow light., The observation lasted between 3 to 4 minutes., The witness observed the object from a local air station or weather station., There were no photographs, physical evidence, or unusual activity in the area during the sighting.
witness description: observed from a local air station or weather station
